title: Cancelling add exception breakpoint has no effect
description: When trying to cancel the process of adding an exception breakpoint, the progress dialog closes immediately. Eventually, the exception list comes up, ignoring the cancellation request. It should either honor the cancellation request or disable the cancel button. To fix this issue, when calling ProgressMonitorDialog.run, pass false for the cancelable parameter.
OB: When trying to cancel the process of adding an exception breakpoint, the progress dialog closes immediately. Eventually, the exception list comes up, ignoring the cancellation request.
EB: The progress dialog should stay open until the cancellation request is honored. The exception list should not appear if the cancellation request is made.
SR:
1. Open the application
2. Navigate to the breakpoint settings
3. Try to add an exception breakpoint
4. During the process, click the 'Cancel' button
5. Verify that the progress dialog stays open until the cancellation request is honored
6. Verify that the exception list does not appear if the cancellation request is made
